original_text: And he walked in the way of Asa his father, and departed not from it, doing that which was right in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 아버지 아사의 길로 행하여 돌이켜 떠나지 아니하고 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: And he walked in the way of Asa his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버지 아사의 길로 행했으며

sentences.original_text: doing that which was right in the sight of the Lord
